title: What song makes you feel discombobulated? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is something no one will probably understand, which is a good thing, really. It's not literal. It's not direct. It's too vague and that's how I prefer it. And I want more people to get exposed to these gals. So there. Cocorosie - Milkman  My brother My only kin I'm lost in tears in the mirror again Lord knows I have no conscience Put a doubt into my mind Where your voice, it still remains Lord knows I still need you But you're far away Lost in some playground In Disneyland Take me with you We'll play to the end Then fall off The face of the earth My brother My long lost friend We cut our hands to have more skin All I found Once I left this land Is the desolation Of humankind Follow me Will you wind this tape again I'll be looking for you Around the next bend
